SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.distributed.networking

Interface Server

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
ServerRMI, ServerStub
public interface Server extends Remote
The Server interface defines the methods that can be invoked remotely by the clients.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    playerMove(List<Coordinates> coordinates, int column, Client client)
    Lets the client perform a move in the game.
    void
    sendMessageTo(String to, String message, Client client)
    Sends a message to a specific recipient.
    void
    setNickname(String nickname, Client client)
    Sets the nickname for a client.
    void
    setNumPlayers(int num, Client client)
    Sets the number of players for the game.

  • Method Details

    • setNickname

      void setNickname(String nickname, Client client) throws RemoteException
      Sets the nickname for a client.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname to set.
      client - The client requesting the nickname.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a communication error occurs during the remote invocation.

    • setNumPlayers

      void setNumPlayers(int num, Client client) throws RemoteException
      Sets the number of players for the game.
      Parameters:
      num - The number of players to set.
      client - The client requesting the number of players change.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a communication error occurs during the remote invocation.

    • playerMove

      void playerMove(List<Coordinates> coordinates, int column, Client client) throws RemoteException
      Lets the client perform a move in the game.
      Parameters:
      coordinates - The list of coordinates representing the player move.
      column - The column in which to place the tiles.
      client - The client performing the move.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a communication error occurs during the remote invocation.

    • sendMessageTo

      void sendMessageTo(@Nullable String to, String message, Client client) throws RemoteException
      Sends a message to a specific recipient.
      Parameters:
      to - the nickname of the recipient (null for broadcasting to all players).
      message - The message to send.
      client - The client sending the message.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a communication error occurs during the remote invocation.
